title: Practical Horticultural Vocational Skills Training for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customized horticultural skills training program based on an employment practicum model

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% adherence to work schedules using horticultural task management skills.
Learners can perform plant cultivation, tool usage, and packaging techniques with 90% accuracy via digital microlearning modules.
Learners can attain an average proficiency of 4.0 or higher across eight vocational rehabilitation performance indicators (e.g., facility management, planting, tool usage).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
